title: Wooden 3-in-1 Balance Bike / Trike
description: The Wishbone Balance Bike evolves with a child's different stages of development, making it unique among balance bikes. With its innovative 3-in-1 design, the Wishbone Bike has both the smallest and the largest height of any balance bike on the market, ensuring that your child will get the maximum use from it over a nu
cleaned_text: About Wishbone Wishbone Design Studio are the creators of an innovative and exquisitely designed line of award-winning, convertible trike/balance bikes. Made in New Zealand, each of their products are lightweight, adjustable, stable and extremely durable. Committed to aiming high to make the world better, Wishbone Design Studio is deeply involved in sustainable manufacturing and supports a variety of charitable organizations. >
